description: IPv4 network accept events capturing when listening sockets accept incoming connections. Pairs with NetworkListenIP4 to track successful inbound connections, critical for detecting lateral movement and unauthorized access.

columns.name: aid
columns.description: Agent ID - unique identifier for the endpoint

columns.name: cid
columns.description: Customer ID - unique identifier for the CrowdStrike tenant

columns.name: ComputerName
columns.description: Hostname of the endpoint receiving the connection

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: Username associated with the accepting process

columns.name: UserSid
columns.description: Windows Security Identifier for the user

columns.name: RemoteAddressIP4
columns.description: Source IPv4 address of the incoming connection

columns.name: RemotePort
columns.description: Source port of the incoming connection

columns.name: LocalAddressIP4
columns.description: Local IPv4 address that accepted the connection

columns.name: LocalPort
columns.description: Local port that accepted the connection

columns.name: ContextProcessId
columns.description: Falcon's unique process identifier for the accepting process

columns.name: FileName
columns.description: Base filename of the accepting process

columns.name: CommandLine
columns.description: Command line of the accepting process

common_operations: Join with NetworkListenIP4 to correlate listen and accept events
Join with ProcessRollup2 via ContextProcessId for process context
Track inbound connections to sensitive services
Identify connection sources across the environment
